Increase the derivation index to generate more addresses for the wallet.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the increase_derivation_index endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Increase the derivation index to generate more addresses","required":["index"],"properties":{"hardened":{"type":["boolean","null"],"description":"Whether to derive hardened addresses (defaults to true if not specified)"},"index":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"The target derivation index to increase to","example":100,"minimum":0},"unhardened":{"type":["boolean","null"],"description":"Whether to derive unhardened addresses (defaults to true if not specified)"}},"title":"IncreaseDerivationIndex"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
